name: novo-app
description: Universal app with Electron desktop and web frontend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter desktop build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter shared clean && pnpm --filter web clean && pnpm --filter desktop clean
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter shared lint && pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter desktop lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter shared type-check && pnpm --filter web type-check && pnpm --filter desktop type-check
